value.0: Ahh, greetings <FullName>. How are you faring on this glorious day?

I know many things young one. I have lived many years in studying things that have been and yet will be. All life has essence and yours is strong. Be wary my friend for not all those that recognize your growth as I do will greet you in friendship as have I.

Aye, some would explain things that they don't understand as crazy. Maybe I was wrong about you. Maybe you are not born of stronger substance than a commoner, like a tired swimmer, swimming towards the horizon. But tell me <boy/girl>, will you drown in the sea of fate or will you realize that the horizon is not your destiny and swim towards the land?
I have a story to tell, would you listen?
You alone will decide the reward of my story. It will definitely give you an insight to things that have passed and may well help you in things that are yet to be.

There was a time when The Mad God ruled our realm with terror, controlling the skies with Dragons Flame. His generals were many, among them the Dragon Riders called the Sacred Flames. Allying themselves with this Dark God of Malice, they reigned supreme across the skies. Nothing was safe from this Mad God's Minions. Released into the world to carry forth his will of Chaos and Destruction.

Aye, he had a score of Dark and Evil generals controlling such hordes, but it is with the Dragons that my story lies. You must understand the importance of controlling the skies in such a war. Terror from above can subjugate far quicker than any army marching.

They were called The Sacred Flames and to the likes of you and me, would be considered immortal beings. No one knows of their true origin, but believe me when I tell you this. They chose, freely to ally themselves with The Mad God.

Through some form of Rite, they had formed a Ritual Bonding with the Dragons that they used as their steeds. Their souls entwined for eternity. Some believe them to be the true birth beginnings of the fabled Red Dragon Disciples.
No, indeed they are not. But all have their heritage lying in darkness.

Yes Indeed, The Sacred Flames.
When the Mad God was finally tricked into slumber, the Dragon Riding Generals themselves withdrew to a land far from here, hidden in the open expanse of the world. No one knew, or cared where they had chosen to hide from us, just as long as they left.

But like the Phoenix rising from the ashes, rumors have started that they are stirring in their sleep. That we will see the return of Dragons in our skies and with the storm that they bring, will The Mad God be in it's Eye.
Oh, I wish that were true. Even as we speak, their secrets are being unveiled.

Because my friend, as I said at the start. I know of things that have been and yet to be. Stop swimming to that horizon and lend yourself to the realm you benefit so much from. Seek out this hiding place of The Dragon Riders and unravel their secrets before others with a more sinister agenda do so.

Because even as we speak, a cloister of Dragon Disciples have found it, and unless we act quickly they will surely find their true heritage and unlock the Draconic Bloodline. If this happens we will see the Sacred Flames in our skies once again, believe me when I tell you this.

We must send our Toughest, Stoutest Warriors to hunt out this Isle of Terror. They must discover how to rouse these Demi-Gods from their slumber, and sever the tie with their Dragon Guardians. Doing whatever is necessary to remove temptation from The Red Dragon Disciples of The Sacred Flames.

Yes, it is your Destiny. Accept it and go forth from here, gathering your Brothers and Sisters in arms. We must show them that it should not, Ney, WILL NOT, be tolerated. Go forth and discover the secret, before it is too late.
The Sacred Flames must be Re-Awakened, their secrets uncovered and removed from temptation, of those that would use such power to subjugate our realm.
Travel to the The Isle of Tolea En'fuin's Northern Shore. There you will find a ship waiting. Show this token to the ships captain.
Good luck my friend, for you will surely be needing plenty of it. And remember, The Toughest, Stoutest Warriors, will be needed on this journey.
Ahhh, greetings <FullName>. I see you are still swimming. Are your arms not growing weary? Perhaps you should seek out that land I see in your Destiny.
Ahhh, greetings <FullName>. How are you faring on this glorious day? I see you found land on your journey? Will you continue with your Destiny?
How do you come to know my name?
Yeh, whatever. Your just another crazy old man.
You talk in riddles old man and I do not have the time for it. Goodbye to you.
I have encountered a creature that talks in riddles as you do. Upon answering it's riddle, I gained experience in my journey. Maybe I should humor you and listen to what you have to say eh?
Explain yourself.
You know, on second thoughts, I just don't have time for this right now.
Hrrm, is this where you ask me to run some fools errand for small or little reward?
Very well, I will listen to your tale. Go on.

I'm sorry to say that you have bored me already. Perhaps you should hire a Bard to tell your stories rather than bore any would be entertainees. I will be sure to point one in your direction, if perchance I encounter one. Goodbye.
Why do you emphasize on the Dragons? I'm sure he would have had an Army Horde if he was to control the realm.
OK, please continue.
I've heard enough, I will excuse myself and be on my way. Goodbye.
Go on.
But not all Dragon Disciples are Evil.!!
So, The Sacred Flames??
So they disappeared, problem solved.
Surely you just talk of Legend!!
Why did you choose to tell me, this?
Why now?
Somehow I am beginning to believe you old man.

We!!
              You want me to do this?
How will I find this place?
Very well, I will do this. But I warn you old man, if this is a Fools Errand, I will come back and make sure you do not fester another's head with your tales of legend.
